snippet.title: Mannequin - Cinematic Reveal Trailer | Meta Quest, PS VR2, SteamVR
snippet.description:
⚠️Open Alpha now live for Meta Quest, join the Discord to play: https://t.co/sGW3dxHPeL ⚠️

The world has stopped. Time is frozen. An extraterrestrial presence has appeared across the globe, but all attempts to make contact with the aliens have failed. Special Agents have been deployed to neutralize the threat once and for all.

Humans call the aliens: Mannequins.

Mannequin is an asymmetric VR multiplayer game for up to 5 players, filled with suspense, social deduction and fast, sudden action. Play as alien Mannequins and set up deadly ambushes by posing as humans frozen in time, or as human Agents and wield high tech gadgets to neutralize the Mannequins from a distance. 

Read more & learn how to play the Meta Quest Open Alpha at www.mannequingame.com

Coming 2024.

#vrgaming #vrgames #vrgame #psvr2 #metaquest2 #metaquest3 #steamvr #multiplayer
